summary: mod that changes the already old appearance of sofia follower, by that of Sucubo-san.
descriptionHtml:
In case of face without animations or with dark textures, reinstall sofia follower and this mod and then reinstall. Always install this mod at the end, for the horn use: AddItemMenu or TDN Equipable Horns.It is very important not to use if sofia has a personalized face or fasial shape, save before installing this mod in case of errors. It is better to use this mod before conoser to sofia for greater compatibility. The english is not my native language

It is just something that ise for fun does not give me a credit for the characters used for this mod.
The grasias are for: rxkx22
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2650523
and djjohnjarvis: https: //www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3679820
author: eideker1369
